## Windows 11 shortcut keys

### Multiple virtual desktops

```{bash}
Ctrl + Win + D: create
Ctrl + Win <--/-->: move to the left or right
Ctrl + Win + F4: delete
Win + Tab: show all desktops and apps in the current desktop
```

### Multiple Apps

```{bash}
Alt + Tab: move to the last active app
Alt Esc: looping through apps
Ctrl + Alt + Tab: show all apps and use <--/--> to move
Alt + F4: close or show power menu if used in desktop level
```
